thread.section_title: Brake Performance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Brake Performance | brakeperformance.com
thread.title: Lufty

author: Lufty
title: Lufty
text: Own a 16 Ram 1500 and purchased the drilled/slotted rotors and premium metallic pads. Have them on my Dakota also. Got rotors in about a week and were packed good for shipping. Easy install and break in. They look great behind the 20" rims. No squeaks. If I towed heavier weight I would of purchased the dimpled/slotted. Also my experience is to stay with the premium metallic pad vs the ceramic. I personally believe ceramic pads can be noisy. Brake dust is marginal with these pads and rotors.
